item.title: Azhage Azhagu: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This is a translation of a recent song from a movie called Saivam that my mum recommended I listen to. I listened to it last night and fell in love with the voice.

item.title: Margazhi Poove: Lyrics and Translations
item.description: I often feel like this woman â€“ grown up but retaining a childlike spirit inside. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BLVuSL7Bpfg **Margazhi Poovae Margazhi Poovae Unmadi Maelae Oaridam Vaendum **

item.title: Vinnodum Mugilodum Lyrics and Translation
item.description: If anyone were to remake this song with rock instruments, I think it would hit the rock charts world wide even if no one understood it.
